title: Periphery
summary: Compatible with Android watch,tablet & phone, used to navigate near by places.
developerAddress:
B-716, Tower B,
Advant Navis Business Park,
Sector 142, Noida Expressway,
Noida, Pincode-201301, Uttar Pradesh, India.
description: Periphery is a navigation tool meant for Android Mobiles and Android Watches, designed for helping users to locate nearby places like ATM, Banks, Restaurant, Cafe, Educational institutes, Hospitals, Hotels, Bus Stop, Taxi stand, Beauty saloon, Laundry, Bar/Liquor store, Electronics store, Home goods and many more.... On the top of it, it also allows user to search by text in mobile and voice in wear.Features :-• Periphery when paired with Android watch(wear) provides navigation details on the wear itself.• Periphery locates your phone with GPS and then provides you with the top searches in your vicinity so that you can find where you need to go.• Periphery keeps your search history so that you can use them as many times as you want. • Get directions with Map with estimated time and distance.• Voice Commands for searching places in wear.• Settings your vicinity radius according to your need.• Google Map is integrated part of Periphery and hence ease to use.
descriptionHTML:
Periphery is a navigation tool meant for Android Mobiles and Android Watches, designed for helping users to locate nearby places like ATM, Banks, Restaurant, Cafe, Educational institutes, Hospitals, Hotels, Bus Stop, Taxi stand, Beauty saloon, Laundry, Bar/Liquor store, Electronics store, Home goods and many more.... On the top of it, it also allows user to search by text in mobile and voice in wear.
Features :-
• Periphery when paired with Android watch(wear) provides navigation details on the wear itself.
• Periphery locates your phone with GPS and then provides you with the top searches in your vicinity so that you can find where you need to go.
• Periphery keeps your search history so that you can use them as many times as you want.
• Get directions with Map with estimated time and distance.
• Voice Commands for searching places in wear.
• Settings your vicinity radius according to your need.
• Google Map is integrated part of Periphery and hence ease to use.
comments: Great app Not pretty, but I don't care. Needs gas stations for perfection
Very useful app to find places near you , best thing is that its support on Android Wear
